data.text: Megyina mʼahwɛe na mawɛn.
Afei, Awurade buae se,
Adiyisɛm no retwɛn nkrabea bi;
“Hwɛ, ɔtamfo no ama ne ho so;
Nokware, nsa yi no ma
“Nnommumfo yi nyinaa bedi ne ho fɛw aserew no aka se,
So wɔn a wode wɔn ka no rensɔre mpofirim ana?
Esiane sɛ woafow aman bebree nti,
“Nnome nka nea ɔde akorɔnne kyekyere ne man,
Woatu nnipa bebree sɛe ho agyina,
Abo a ɛhyehyɛ afi afasu mu no bɛteɛ mu,
“Nnome nka nea ɔnam mogyahwiegu so kyekyere kuropɔn
Asafo Awurade ahyɛ sɛ,
Na Awurade anuonyam ho nimdeɛ bɛhyɛ asase nyinaa ma,
“Due! Wo a woma wo mfɛfo nsa,
Worennya anuonyam biara, wʼani bewu.
Awurukasɛm a wode adi Lebanon no bɛmene wo,
“Mfaso bɛn na munya fi ahoni a nipa ayɛ mu?
Nnome nka nea ɔka kyerɛ dua se, ‘Nya nkwa!’
Nanso Awurade wɔ nʼasɔrefi kronkron mu.
